extendedInfo.description: Do you have a problem with drugs or alcohol? Know someone who does?  Get an in-depth look at one of The Most Noteworthy Guides On Drug Addiction Available on the market today!  This program gives you a wide array of tips, including guidelines on how to recognize a problem and break the addiction habit, exercises to clarify addictions and behaviors, and a comprehensive guide to drugs of abuse.Written in a simple, straightforward manner, this program is an easy to understand primer for both those just interested in drug addiction and those truly trying to break the habit.APP INCLUDES:- Why People Use- Identifying Your Problem- Signs in Others- How Addiction Works- Types of Drugs (and Info about each)- Cocaine, Heroin, Meth,   ~ Oxy/Opiates and Buprenorphine   ~ Xanax and Benzos  ~ Ritalin and Stimulants...and much more!-  Rehab Info- Safe Detoxing- Working the 12 Steps- Involving the Family- Intervention- Sobriety- Calming the Soul- Teens & Drugs- QUIZ: Are You An Addict?- Exercise: Do you have an Alcohol Problem?- Exercise: Tracking Table- Notes/Journal- Calendar: Keep track of your progress (or lack thereof)PLUS MORE! This is a great app if you are looking for general information on drug addiction, and/or to take steps to change your life style or better understand someone who is stuggling with the disease.KEYWORDS: "drug addiction","aa,na","opiates,oxy,roxi,withdrawl,drug,drugs,pills,rehab,addiction,intervention"

reviews.title: Would be better if..
reviews.comment: The slider at the bottom of the page would not take u to a broken link when u flip pages..
reviews.author: A Google User
